meanings.definition: to remove the rigging from (a ship)
meanings.sent1: He unrigs the ship before the storm.
meanings.sent2: She always unrigs the sailboat after sailing.
meanings.sent3: The pirate unrigs the ship to hide it from the enemy.
meanings.sent4: The sailor unrigs the ship like a skilled craftsman.
meanings.sent5: Unrigs the ship carefully to avoid any damage.

meanings.sent1: The workers unrig the old building for renovation.
meanings.sent2: He unrigs the tent after the camping trip.
meanings.sent3: She unrigs the sandcastle to rebuild it taller.
meanings.sent4: The mechanic unrigs the engine with precision.
meanings.sent5: Unrigs the structure piece by piece for recycling.

meanings.definition: to strip or remove equipment or gear from (a vehicle)
meanings.sent1: He unrigs the car before selling it.
meanings.sent2: She unrigs the bike to clean it thoroughly.
meanings.sent3: The thief unrigs the motorcycle for parts.
meanings.sent4: The mechanic unrigs the truck for maintenance.
meanings.sent5: Unrigs the vehicle carefully to avoid losing any parts.
